business_flow.step 1: Click the 'New' button in Money Manager Ex to create a new transaction.
business_flow.step 3: Click cell A2 in the Excel spreadsheet.
business_flow.step 4: Press Ctrl+C in Excel to copy the selected cell's content.
business_flow.step 5: Switch back to Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 6: Click the 'Amount' field in Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 9: Get value of cell B2 in the Excel spreadsheet.
business_flow.step 10: Switch back to Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 11: Click the 'Account' combobox to reveal the dropdown list of available accounts, then select the value shows in Excel cell B2.
business_flow.step 13: Select cell C2 in the Excel spreadsheet.
business_flow.step 14: Press Ctrl+C in Excel to copy the selected cell's content.
business_flow.step 15: Switch back to Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 16: Click the 'Payee' field in Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 19: Click on cell D2 in the Excel spreadsheet.
business_flow.step 20: Press Ctrl+C in Excel to copy the selected cell's content.
business_flow.step 21: Switch back to Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 22: Click the 'Category' field in Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 24: Click the 'OK' button in the 'New Transaction' dialog box.
